heading: Exobiology.
general-note: Here are entered works on the study of processes occurring in outer space that are relevant to biology, especially the origin and evolution of life. Works on the biology of humans or other earth life while in outer space are entered under. Space biology.. Works on life indigenous to outer space are entered under. Life on other planets.. Works on the prospective use of the science of anthropology in dealing with intelligent beings in outer space, or establishing earth colonies on extraterrestrial bodies, are entered under. Extraterrestrial anthropology..
